title: New: B O K E H – I Know You Know
body:
Took me a couple of listens to really fall in love with this debut track of Berlin via New Zealand’s **B O K E H** aka Chloë Lewer, but was hooked once I did.

Ambitious yet intimate songwriting, with just enough of a pop leaning edge for it to be instantaneously memorable – especially when coupled with the deliriously over the top finale. Check out _I Know You Know_ below.
